For Post-Acute Care Settings, the MDS/OASIS Self Care or Mobility question code

name: FunctionalStatusQuestionVS
title: Functional Status Question VS
publisher: HL7 Patient Care WG and Community-Based Care and Privacy WG
description: For Post-Acute Care Settings, the MDS/OASIS Self Care or Mobility question code

concept.display: Independent - Patient completed the activities by him/herself, with or without an assistive device, with no assistance from a helper.
Needed some help - Patient needed partial assistance from another person to complete activities.
Dependent - A helper completed the activities for the patient.
